attributes.action: DWP: Revise the PIP Mobility - It should be on a graded scale like daily living
attributes.background: It’s not as simple as one yes/no question as to whether you can walk 200metres as to if you qualify for a mobility pip payment, it should be a graded points scale just like it is in the daily living section of PIP.

rejection.details:
The PIP assessment criteria for mobility activities already has a number of different descriptors for people with different levels of mobility. You can read the PIP assessment criteria here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/personal-independence-payment-assessment-guide-for-assessment-providers/pip-assessment-guide-part-2-the-assessment-criteria

We could accept a petition calling for the PIP assessment criteria to be changed, but it would need to be clear what changes you want to be made.
